name: AI vs Family
description:
AI vs Family- a game made in the Wowie Jam 4.0 hosted by Jonas Tyroller.

In AI vs Family, you 'code' artificial intelligence, which works for you to take down your family as they invade your room in attempts to force you outside.

All sounds imported from Mixkit library and this was made with Godot game engine.

It plays similarly to a tower defense game, however some of the robots can move around, and there is no set path for the enemies to take.
